text: ۞كُلُّ ٱلطَّعَامِ كَانَ حِلّٗا لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ إِلَّا مَا حَرَّمَ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تُنَزَّلَ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةُۚ قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ فَٱتۡلُوهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

translation.en: All food was lawful to the Children of Israel except what Israel had made unlawful to himself before the Torah was revealed. Say, [O Muhammad], "So bring the Torah and recite it, if you should be truthful
translation.id: Semua makanan itu halal bagi Bani Israil, kecuali makanan yang diharamkan oleh Israil (Yakub) atas dirinya sebelum Taurat diturunkan.131) Katakanlah (Muhammad), "Maka bawalah Taurat lalu bacalah, jika kamu orang-orang yang benar
